text: Neapolis () was a town in ancient Isauria. It became a bishopric: no longer the seat of a residential bishop, it remains, under the name of Neapolis in Isauria, a titular see of the Roman Catholic Church.Catholic Hierarchy Its site is unlocated. ==References== Category:Populated places in ancient Isauria Category:Roman towns and cities in Turkey Category:Former populated places in Turkey Category:Populated places of the Byzantine Empire Category:Catholic titular sees in Asia Category:Lost ancient cities and towns
title: Neapolis (Isauria)
